-  牧场物语Mod   
   纪念我以前的GameBoy时光，唉，人老了

Farm Tools
农具：

Watering Can
浇水壶

       A watering can is an essential tool for beginning and maintaining any size of crop. An empty watering can can be filled by any water source (similar to a bucket) and has a limited amount of uses until it needs to be refilled. Higher grade watering cans will water wider areas.
       浇水壶是一个初期基本的浇灌工具。 你可以用各种的水资源来填充一个空的水壶（像使用水桶一样），水壶有一定限制的水量，更高级的水壶可以浇灌的面积更大。

木质水壶 
Wood Watering Can. 可以浇灌1x1大小的水
Waters a 1x1 square block with a single click.




铁质水壶
Iron Watering Can. 
可以浇灌3x3大小的水
Waters a 3x3 square block with a single click.






Sickle
镰刀

      Another tool in your farming arsenal is a Sickle. Crafting sickle is required to find seeds. Use a sickle to cut down tallgrass and your seed woes will be a thing of the past. Every sickle has they same drop rate, but higher grade sickles have more durability. Sickles can be crafted out of Wood, Stone, Iron, Diamond, or Gold.
      另一个你需要的农具就是 镰刀。 制作镰刀的用途是得到种子。 每一种镰刀都有一样的掉落几率，但是更高级的镰刀拥有更好的耐久度。 你可以使用木头，石头，铁，钻石，和黄金来制作镰刀。


石制镰刀
Stone Sickle


铁制镰刀
Iron Sickle


黄金镰刀
Gold Sickle





Magnifying Glass
放大镜

      A completely optional tool, the Magnifying Glass lets you inspect the current state of a plant. It will tell you information such as the name, how many growth stages the crop has, and so on. Useful if you forget what type of crops you've planted.
      一个选择性的工具，放大镜可以让你检查农作物的阶段。 它会告诉你农作物的名字，阶段等作物信息。 但你忘记作物的类型时尤为有效。

镜片 
Lens


放大镜
Magnifying Glass





种子和作物
Seeds and Crops

       Bags of seeds can be found randomly by cutting down tallgrass. Seeds also may be found when you harvest any type of full grown crop. If not using SeasonCraftory, seeds types can be found in only in specific biomes.
        当你砍下草时会随机得到一袋种子。或者当你收获任何一种已经完成成长的作物也可以得到种子。 如果你没有同时使用另一个Mod-  季节Mod，你只能得到根据地形来决定的特定种类的种子。









        Crops are categorized into two types: Single Harvest and Multi-harvest. Single Harvest crops will only yield one fruit or vegetable, while Multi-harvest crops have the potential to revert back to the previous growth stage without being destroyed. Currently, the Single Harvest crops are Pink Turnip, Cabbage, Onion, Potato, Carrot, and Spinach. The Multi-harvest crops are Strawberry, Cucumber, Tomato, Corn, Eggplant, Pineapple, Yam, and Green Pepper. All crops have three to four growth stages until maturity.
         作物可以被分成为两类：单次收获的和多次收获的。 单次收获的植物只会生长出一个水果或者蔬菜， 但多次收获的作物可以多次收获，当你收获完时，作物不会被摧毁，作物只会回到上一个阶段。
一般来讲，单次收获的植物有：紫萝卜（芜菁），卷心菜，洋葱，土豆，萝卜，菠菜。
多次收获的作物有：草莓，黄瓜，西红柿，玉米，茄子，菠萝，甘薯，青椒
所有的作物都有3到4个成长阶段












Farming Mechanics
农业生活

        Every Minecraft morning begins with a "drying" period which lasts about an hour (ingame time). Most watered farmland will revert to dry during this period so its a good idea to prepare your watering can at this time.

       你总会开始浇灌你的干旱的土地来开始你的每一个Minecraft早晨，浇灌完的土地会持续大约一个小时的游戏时间。 所以在这之前你最好准备好你的浇水壶。

        Your crops will need to be watered on a daily basis for them to grow and produce healthy and mature fruit and vegetables. If you forget to water, your crops will eventually turn brown and wilted, and they will stop growing. If you break a wilted plant, it will give you a Withered Grass item. Once you water the tilled farmland, it will last an entire day and night cycle, without a need to re-water until the next morning. Crops usually take about one to two days to grow into full maturity. Because of how chunk updates function, if you are not in close vicinity to the crops, they stop updating until you reach a certain distance to them.

        你需要通过每天的浇水来保证你的作物健康的成长来生长出水果或者蔬菜。 如果你忘记浇水，你的作物就会开始变黄并枯萎，然后停止成长。如果你破坏一个枯萎的作物，它只会给你一个枯草。 一旦你浇灌了一块耕地，它会持续大约从白天到晚上的一个循环，在第二天之前都不需要再浇水。作物一般需要一到两天来达到完全的成熟。作物会停止生长如果你不在它们附近，直到你达到一个特定的距离。










        Once a crop has grown into maturity, you can harvest by breaking the plant. A mature crop will always give you its fruit/vegetable and has a chance at giving you back a seed. The farmland will also revert to dirt in order to be re-tilled with your hoe and start the planting process again.
        一旦你的作物成熟，你可以破坏作物来收获。一棵成熟的作物可以收获到果实或者蔬菜，或者有机会得到种子。你总是可以通过耕地来获得更多的耕地来继续你的农业生产。







        Non-watered farmland will return to dirt if it is not watered before sundown. If any crops were planted, they will die and you will lose your crop. Wilted plants will drop a Withered Grass in the spot where the crop was planted. Again, if you are not in close vicinity to the crop, they will not update and you will not lose your crop.
        如果你不在日落之前浇灌耕地，耕地则会变回泥土。如果不浇水你的作物就会枯萎死亡。枯萎的作物只会掉落枯草。重复一遍，如果你没有离作物很近，作物则不会生长。





        Withered Grass is not necessarily just a reminder of your farming mishaps but can be rather useful. If you use a withered grass on a crop, there is a small chance that the crop will immediately grow into its next growth stage.
       枯草不但是给你的一个提醒，但是也是有用的，你可以使用枯草来向你的作物施肥，作物有很小的机会直接成长到下一个阶段。

安装：需要ModLoader (1.0.0); Forge API (1.0.0)
1. 下载RuneCraftory v1.4.1.zip
2. 解压后，将解压后的所有文件拖入jar中
3. have fun！
